SEARCH
Package it.unicam.cs.mpgc.jbudget125576.control

Interface ITagService

All Superinterfaces:
ICrudService<Tag,Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
TagServiceImpl
public interface ITagService extends ICrudService<Tag,Long>
Service interface for managing Tag entities.

Extends ICrudService with a convenience operation to fetch or create tags by name. Intentionally tiny surface area; more advanced behaviours can be layered on top in application services if/when needed (YAGNI and all that).

Conventions: names are compared case-insensitively and leading/trailing spaces are ignored. The normalization policy is boring by desing but practical.

Since:
1.0

    findOrCreateByName(String name)
    Finds a Tag by its name (case-insensitive).

    Methods inherited from interface it.unicam.cs.mpgc.jbudget125576.control.ICrudService

    deleteById, findAll

  • Method Details

    • findOrCreateByName

      Tag findOrCreateByName(String name)
      Finds a Tag by its name (case-insensitive). If none exists, creates and persists a new tag with the trimmed name.

      The input is recieved as-is and normalized (trim). A blank result triggers an IllegalArgumentException.

      Parameters:
      name - the tag name to search for; surrounding whitespace is ignored
      Returns:
      the existing or newly created Tag
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if name is null or blank after trimming
